text:
a

prefix 1. prefix ā shortened before a double consonant. 2. a negative prefixed to nouns, adjectives; and participles. 3. the augment prefixed to some roots in the Past and Conditional Tenses; e.g. akāsi.

aṃsa

masculine & neuter 1. a part; a side; 2. shoulder.

aṃsu

masculine ray of light; a fibre.

akaṭa

adjective 1. not done; not made; 2. not artificial.

akata

adjective 1. not done; not made; 2. not artificial.

akatattā

indeclinable because one has not done.

akaraṇīya

pt.p. of that should not be done; (nt.), improper action.

akāsi

aor. of karoti. did, made, or performed.

akiriyavāda

masculine the theory that therre is no after-death of action.

akusala

neuter demerit; sin; bad action. (adj.), unskilful.

akkanta

pp. of akkamati 1. stepped upon; trodden; 2. subdued.

akkamati

ā + kam + a steps or treads upon; subjugates.

akkamana

neuter 1. stepping or treading upon; 2. subjugation.

akkuṭṭha

pp. of akkosati abused; reviled; scolded.

akkocchi

aor. of akkosati abused; reviled; scolded.

akkosati

ā + kus + a abuses; reviles; scolds.

akkosi

aor. of akkosati abused; reviled; scolded.

akkositvā

abs. of akkosati having abused; having reviled; having scolded.

akkha

neuter sense organ. (m.), axle; dice; beleric myrobalan; a measurement equal to 20 grains. (akkha in the cpds. such as visālakkha, sahasakkha is from the stem akkhi = eye).

akkhaṇavedhī

masculine an archer who shoots as quickly as lightning or shoots only to graze the object.

akkhaya

adjective changeless; eternal; decayless. (nt.), the eternal peace.

akkharaphalaka

masculine a board or slate to write on.

akkharasamaya

masculine the science of writing and reading.

akkhāta

pp. of akkhāti announced; told; declared.

akkhāti

ā + khā + a announces; tells; declares.

akkhātar

masculine one who relates or preaches.

akkhāyī

masculine one who relates or preaches.

akkhāsi

aor. of akkhāti announced; told; declared.

akkhitta

adjective not despised or thrown away.

akkhobhinī

feminine 1. a number consisting of 42 ciphers; 2. an army of 109, 350 soldiers, 65, 610 horses, 21870 elephants and 21, 870 war chariots.

akkhohinī

feminine a high numeral with 43 cyphers.

agaru

adjective not heavy; not troublesome. (m.), aloe wood.

agāraka

neuter a small house; a cottage.

agga

adjective the highest; the top-most. (m.), the end; the top.

aggañña

adjective known as the highest or foremost.

aggaphala

neuter 1. the first harvest of a cultivation; 2. supreme fruit of arahantship.

aggamagga

masculine the highest path of salvation.

aggikkhandha

masculine a great mass of fire.

aggha

masculine price; value. (nt.), obligation made to a guest.

agghaka

adjective (in cpds:), having the value of.

agghanaka

adjective (in cpds:), having the value of.

agghāpaniya

neuter that which is to be valued.

agghika

neuter a post decorated with festoons.

agghiya

neuter a post decorated with festoons; an abligation made to a guest.

agha

neuter 1. the sky; 2. grief; pain; 3. sin; misfortune.

aṅka

masculine 1. the lap; 2. a mark; sign; 3. a numerical figure.

aṅkita

pp. of aṅketi marked out; branded.

aṅkusa

masculine a pole with a hook used for plucking fruits or to guide an elephant.

aṅketi

aki + e marks out; brands; puts a number on.

aṅketvā

abs. of aṅketi having marked out; having branded.

aṅkesi

aor. of aṅketi marked out; branded.

aṅga

neuter 1. a constituent part; 2. a limb; 3. quality.

aṅgajāta

neuter the male or female organ.

aṅgaṇa

neuter 1. an open space; a court yard; 2. impurity of mind.

aṅgarakāsu

feminine a pit full of cinders.

aṅgarāga

masculine a cosmetic to anoint the body with.

aṅgavijjā

feminine palmistry and other prognostications from the marks on the body.

aṅgika

adjective (in cpds:), consisting of so many parts; e.g. duvaṅgika = consisting of two parts.

aṅgīrasa

masculine the resplendent one; the Buddha.

aṅgula

neuter an inch; a finger-breadth. (adj.), (in cpds:) measuring so many inches.

acava

adjective low. (Only in the combination uccāvaca).

aciraṃ

adverb recently; not long ago; before long.

accagā

pret. of ati + gam he surpassed, overcame.

accaya

masculine 1. fault; 2. lapse; 3. passing away. (accayena = after the lapse of).

accādhāya

abs. having placed one (leg) upon the other in a slightly changed position.

accuta

adjective everlasting; not passing away. (nt.), eternal peace.

accesi

aor. of acceti passes time; gets over; respected.

accogāḷha

adjective plunged into a great depth.

acchati

ās + a > sa > ccha (ās + a; ā is shortened and sa changed to ccha), sits; remains; waits.

accharā

feminine 1. a nymph; 2. snapping of fingers; a short moment.

acchariya

neuter a marvel; wonder. (adj.), wonderful; marvellous.

acchādita

pp. of acchādeti clothed; covered with.

acchādeti

ā + chad + e clothes; covers with.

acchādesi

aor. of acchādeti clothed; covered with.

acchijja

abs. of acchindati robbed; plundered; took by force; broke off.

acchindati

ā + chid + ṃ-a 1. robs; plunders; takes by force; 2. breaks off.

acchindi

aor. of acchindati robbed; plundered; took by force; broke off.

acchinna

aor. of acchindati robbed; plundered; took by force; broke off.

acchecchi

aor. of chindati broke away; cut out; destroyed.

acchera

neuter a marvel; wonder. (adj.), wonderful; marvellous.

ajātasattu

masculine a born enemy; name of a king.

ajānitvā

abs. not knowing; being unaware of.

ajāniya

abs. not knowing; being unaware of.

ajina

masculine a cheetah, i.e. a long limbed beast of cat family with tawny fur and black spots. The Sinhalese term “andum diviyā” shows that it is a kind of leopard. nt. its hide.

ajinakkhipa

masculine a cloak made of cheetah's hide.

ajinappaveṇī

feminine a bed-sheet made of cheetah's hide.

ajinasāṭi

feminine a garment made of skin.

ajjatagge

adverb henceforth; from this day forth.

ajjācāra

masculine 1. transgression; wrong behaviour; 2. sexual intercourse.

ajjuna

masculine 1. the tree Pentapatera Arjuna; 2. name of a prince.

ajjhagā

pret. of adhigacchati came to; obtained; experienced.

ajjhatta

adjective personal; connected with the self.

ajjhappatta

adjective having fallen upon or approached unexpectedly.

ajjhabhāsati

adhi + ā + bhās + a addresses; speaks.

ajjhācarati

adhi + ā + car + a transgresses; conducts against the rules.

ajjhācari

aor. of ajjhācarati transgressed; conducted against the rules.

ajjhāciṇṇa

pp. of ajjhācarati 1. much practised; 2. habitually done.

ajjhāpanna

pp. of ajjhāpajjati become guilty of an offence.

ajjhāruhati

adhi + ā + ruh + a rises up; climbs over.

ajjhāruhi

aor. of ajjhāruhati rose up; climbed over.

ajjhārūḷha

pp. of ajjhāruhati risen up; climbed over.

ajjhāvasati

adhi + ā + vas + a inhabits; dwells; settles down.

ajjhāvasi

aor. of ajjhāvasati inhabited; dwelt; settled down.

ajjhāvasitvā

abs. of ajjhāvasati having inhabited; having dwelt; having settled down.

ajjhāsayatā

feminine (in cpds:) the fact of having the intention of.

ajjhupagacchati

adhi + upa + gam + a arrives; reaches; consents.

ajjhupagata

pp. of ajjhupagacchati arrived; reached; consented.

ajjhupekkhati

adhi + upa + ikkh + a is indifferent; neglects.

ajjhupekkhi

aor. of ajjhupekkhati was indifferent; neglected.

ajjhupeta

pp. of ajjhupeti come near; approached.

ajjhupeti

adhi + upa + i + a comes near; approaches.

ajjhupesi

aor. of ajjhupeti came near; approached.

ajjhokirati

adhi + ava + kir + a scatters over.

ajjhogāḷha

pp. of ajjhogāhati plunged into; entered; immersed.

ajjhogāhati

adhi + ava + gāh + a plunges into; enters; immerses.

ajjhogāhi

aor. of ajjhogāhati plunged into; entered; immersed.

ajjhotthaṭa

pp. of ajjhottharati spread over; submerged with.

ajjhottharati

adhi + ava + thar + a submerges; overpowers.

ajjhoharaṇīya

adjective fit to be swallowed or eaten.

añjanavaṇṇa

adjective of the colour of collyrium, i.e. black.

añjanāḷi

feminine a tube for collyrium; toilet box.

añjanī

feminine a collyrium box or a brush to apply collyrium with.

añjali

feminine lifting of the folded hands as a token of reverence.

añjalipuṭa

masculine folded fingers, in order to retain something in.

añjeti

añju + e anoints with; applies collyrium.

añjesi

aor. of añjeti anointed with; applied collyrium.

aññatama

adjective one out of many; unknown.

aññatitthiya

masculine an adherent of another faith.

aññathā

adverb otherwise; in a different way.

aññadatthu

indeclinable 1. surely; 2. at any rate; 3. on the other hand.

aññadā

adverb on another day; at another time.

aññamaññaṃ

adverb one another; each other; mutually.

aññavihita

adjective being occupied with something else; distracted.

aññāta

adjective 1. (ā + ñāta:), known; understood; 2. (na + ñāta:) unknown; not recognised.

aññātaka

adjective 1. not related by blood; 2. unknown; 3. not recognisable.

aññātāvī

masculine one who knows or has insight.

aññātar

masculine one who knows or has insight.

aṭaṭa

masculine 1. name of a minor hell; 2. a high numeral.

aṭavisaṅkhobha

masculine an agitation among wild tribes.

aṭisevanta

pr.p. of paṭisevati following; pursueing; practising; indulging in; using a medicine, etc.

aṭṭa

neuter 1. lawsuit; 2. watch tower; 3. a scaffold for workers. (adj.) (from aṭṭita:) grieved; afflicted.

aṭṭaka

masculine a high platform or scaffold for watchers workers.

aṭṭāna

neuter a post incised with squares and used as a rubber by bathing people.

aṭṭita

pp. of ardayati distressed; grieved; afflicted with.

aṭṭīyati

aṭṭ + ī + ya is in trouble; is worried.

aṭṭīyi

aor. of aṭṭīyati was in trouble; was worried.

aṭṭhakathā

feminine a commentary; explanation of meaning.

aṭṭhamī

feminine the eighth day of the lunar month.

aṭṭhāna

neuter 1. a wrong place or position; 2. an impossibility.

aṭṭhīkatvā

abs. having much attention; being interested.

aḍḍhatiya

adjective consisting of two and a half.

aḍḍhateyya

adjective consisting of two and a half.

aḍḍhadaṇḍaka

neuter one half of a stick which is split into two; a short stick.

aḍḍhayoga

masculine a kind of house which has a roof in the shape of an eagle's wing.

aṇāpaka

masculine one who commands or issues orders.

aṇu

masculine a very small particle; an atom. (adj.), minute; subtle; atomic.

aṇumatta

adjective of very small size; tiny.

aṇḍaja

adjective oviparous; born of an egg. (m.), a bird; a serpent.

aṇḍūpaka

neuter 1. a coil; 2. a pad for keeping something on.

aṇha

masculine day; only in cpds. such as pubbaṇha.

ati

prefix a prefix giving the meanings: up to, over, gone beyond, excess, etc.

atikaḍḍhati

ati + kaḍḍh + a pulls too hard; troubles.

atikaḍḍhi

aor. of atikaḍḍhati pulled too hard; troubled.

atikkanta

pp. of atikkamati went beyond; passed over; overcame; surpassed.

atikkama

masculine going over; passing beyond; transgression.

atikkamati

ati + kam + a goes beyond; passes over; overcomes; surpasses.

atikkami

aor. of atikkamati went beyond; passed over; overcame; surpassed.

atikhīṇa

adjective 1. much exhausted; much wasted; 2. shot from (a bow).

atiga

adjective (=atigata, pp. of atigacchati), gone over; surmounted.

atigacchati

ati + gam + a overcomes; surpasses; surmounts.

atigacchi

aor. of atigacchati overcame; surpassed; surmounted.

atigata

pp. of atigacchati gone over; surmounted.

aticarati

ati + car + a transgresses; commits adultery.

aticari

aor. of aticarati transgressed; commited adultery.

aticca

abs. having passed beyond; having overcome.

atittha

neuter an unsuitable place, way or manner.

atidūra

neuter a great distance. (adj.), too far; very distant.

atidhamati

ati + dham + a beats a drum too often or too loud.

atidhami

aor. of atidhamati beat a drum too often or too loud.

atidhāvati

ati + dhāv + a runs fast; passes over the limits.

atidhāvi

aor. of atidhāvati ran fast; passed over the limits.

atidhonacārī

adjective one who indulges too much in food, clothes, etc.

atibāheti

ati + vah + e drives away; pulls out.

atibāhesi

aor. of atibāheti drove away; pulled out.

atimuttaka

masculine name of a monk; the plant Guertnera Racemosa.

atiriccati

ati + ric + ya to be left over; remains.

atiritta

pp. of atiriccati left over; remaining.

atirocati

ati + ruc + a outshines; surpasses in splendour.

atiroci

aor. of atirocati outshined; urpassed in splendour.

ativattati

ati + vat + a passes over; goes beyond.

ativassati

ati + vass + a rains down on or into.

ativassi

aor. of ativassati rained down on or into.

ativāhaka

adjective one who carries a burden; a guide.

ativuṭṭha

pp. of ativassati rained down on or into.

atisarati

ati + sar + a goes beyond the limits; transgresses.

atisari

aor. of atisarati went beyond the limits; transgressed.

atiharati

ati + har + a 1. carries over; 2. brings.

atīta

adjective past; gone by. (m.), the past.

attaja

adjective proceeding from oneself. (m.), a son.

attha

pres. 2nd plu. of atthi. pres. 2nd plu. of atthi.

atthakusala

adjective clever in finding what is beneficial; clever in exposition.

atthacara

adjective doing good; busy in the interest of others.

atthaññū

adjective one who knows the meaning or what is good.

atthata

pp. of attharati spread over with.

attharati

ā + thar + a spreads; lays out.

attharāpeti

caus. of attharati causes to be spread.

atthari

aor. of attharati spread; laid out.

atthāya

dat. of attha for the sake of, Kilamatthāya = what for?

atthi

as + a + ti to be; to exist.

atthitā

feminine existence; the fact of being present.

atthibhāva

masculine existence; the fact of being present.

atthu

imper. of atthi be it so.

atraja

adjective born from oneself. (m.), a son.

adadi

aor. of dadāti gave; offered; allowed; granted; handed over.

adāsi

aor. of deti gave. See dadāti

adu

neuter (of amu), such and such a thing.

adurāgata

neuter nto unwelcome or not a bad coming.

addhagata

adjective one who has traversed the span of life.

addhagghanaka

adjective having the worth of a half kahāpaṇa.

addhaniya

adjective fit for travelling; lasting a long period.

addhāna

neuter a long path, time, or journey; highroad.

addhānamagga

masculine a long path; high road.

adhi

preposition up to; over; on; above.

adhikaraṇaṃ

adverb in consequence of; because of; for the sake of.

adhikaraṇasamatha

masculine settling of a dispute or a lawsuit.

adhigacchati

adhi + gam + a attains; obtains; understands.

adhigacchi

aor. of adhigacchati attained; obtained; understood.

adhigaṇhāti

adhi + gah + ṇhā surpasses; possesses; overpowers.

adhigaṇhi

aor. of adhigaṇhāti surpassed; possessed; overpowered.

adhigata

pp. of adhigacchati attained; obtained; understood.

adhigameti

adhi + gam + e attains; obtains; understands.

adhigahita

pp. of adhigaṇhāti surpassed; possessed; overpowered.

adhicitta

neuter 1. higher thought; 2. concentration of mind.

adhicca

abs. of adhīyati having learnt or recited.

adhiccasamuppanna

adjective arisen without a cause; spontaneous.

adhiṭṭhahati

adhi + ṭhā + a stands firmly; determines; fixes one's attention on.

adhiṭṭhahi

aor. of adhiṭṭhahati stood firmly; determined; fixed one's attention.

adhiṭṭhāti

adhi + ṭhā + a stands firmly; determines; fixes one's attention on.

adhiṭṭhāya

abs. of adhiṭṭhāti having stood firmly; having determined; having fixed one's attention.

adhiṭṭhāyaka

adjective superintending; looking after. (m.), a superintendent.

adhiṭṭhāsi

aor. of adhiṭṭhāti stood firmly; determined; fixed one's attention.

adhimānika

adjective one who thinks that he has attained some supernatural knowledge not actually being so.

adhimuccati

adhi + muc + ya attaches or inclines towards; possesses by a spirit.

adhimuccana

neuter 1. making up one's mind; 2. possession by a spirit.

adhimucci

aor. of adhimuccati attached or inclined towards; possessed by a spirit.

adhimutta

pp. of adhimuccati was intent upon; inclined to.

adhivasati

adhi + vas + a inhabits; lives in.

adhivasi

aor. of adhivasati inhabited; lived in.

adhivāseti

adhi + vas + e endures; waits for.

adhivāsesi

aor. of adhivāseti endured; waited for.

adhivuttha

pp. of adhivasati inhabited; lived in.

adhīta

pp. of adhīyati studied; learnt by heart.

adhīyati

adhi + ī + ya studies; learns by heart.

adhīyi

aor. of adhīyi studied; learnt by heart.

adhomukha

adjective bent over; with face cast down; turned upside down.

anajjhiṭṭha

adjective unasked for; being not invited.

anapāyinī

feminine which does not leave; not deserting.

anabhāva

(anu + abhāva), m. utter cessation. *ana + bhāva (given in ptsd.) is not correct.

anamatagga

adjective one whose beginning is unknown.

anāgata

adjective not come yet. (m.), the future.

anāgāmī

masculine one who does not return, i.e. the person who has attained the 3rd Path.

anādā

abs. of na + ādāti without taking.

anādāya

abs. of na + ādāti without taking.

anādiyitvā

abs. not heeding; not taking up.

anāḷhika

adjective poor; one who does not possess even a measure of rice.

anāvattī

masculine one who does not return.

anikkasāva

adjective not free from impurity of mind.

anissara

adjective having no power or influence.

anītika

adjective free from injury or harm.

anītiha

adjective not based on hearsay; known by oneself.

anukata

pp. of anukaroti imitated; repeated some action.

anukantati

anu + kant + a cuts into; shears.

anukanti

aor. of anukantati cut into; sheared.

anukampaka

adjective compassionate; one who has pity.

anukampati

anu + kamp + a has pity on.

anukampi

aor. of anukampati had pity on.

anukampī

adjective compassionate; one who has pity.

anukari

aor. of anukaroti imitated; repeated some action.

anukaroti

anu + kar + o imitates; repeats some action. = anukubbati

anukubbati

v. imitates; repeats some action. = anukaroti

anukkamena

adverb gradually; by degrees; in order; in due course.

anugacchati

anu + gam + a follows; goes after.

anugacchi

aor. of anugacchati followed; went after.

anugata

pp. of anugacchati accompanied by; gone into.

anugantabba

pt.p. of anugacchati would follow; would go after.

anugantuṃ

inf. of anugacchati to follow; to go after.

anugāmika

adjective going along with; a follower.

anugāhati

anu + gāh + a plunges into; enters.

anugāhi

aor. of anugāhati plunged into; entered.

anuggaṇhāti

anu + gah + ṇhā helps; has pity on.

anuggaṇhi

aor. of anuggaṇhāti helped; had pity on.

anugghāṭeti

anu + u + ghaṭ + e opens; unfastens. *ptsd. gives an opposite meaning after showing its construction as: “an + ugghāṭeti.”

anucaṅkamati

anu + kam + a follows one who is walking up and down.

anucaṅkami

aor. of anucaṅkamati follwed one who is walking up and down.

anucarita

pp. of anucarati accompanied by; pervaded with; practised.

anuciṇṇa

pp. of anucarati practised; attained; acquainted with.

anucita

(na + ucita), adj. improper; not befitting.

anucināti

anu + ci + nā collects or practises.

anucini

aor. of anucināti collocted or practised.

anucinteti

anu + cit + e thinks upon; considers.

anucintesi

aor. of anucinteti thought upon; considered.

anuccārita

adjective not uttered or raised up.

anucciṭṭha

adjective untouched; (food) that is not left over.

anujāta

adjective born after or resembling (one's father).

anujānāti

anu + ñā + nā allows; gives permission.

anujāni

aor. of anujānāti allowed; gave permission.

anuññāta

pp. of anujānāti allowed; permitted; sanctioned.

anuṭṭhahanta

adjective One who does not rouse himself; inactive (person).

anuṭṭhahāna

adjective One who does not rouse himself; inactive (person).

anuṭṭhātar

adjective One who does not rouse himself; inactive (person).

anuḍahati

anu + dah + a burns over; consumes.

anuḍahi

aor. of anuḍahati burnt over; consumed.

anutiṭṭhati

anu + ṭhā + a 1. stands near by; 2. agrees.

anutīra

neuter neighbourhood of a bank or shore.

anutīraṃ

adverb along the bank or shore.

anutthunanta

pr.p. of anutthunāti would moan; would lament.

anutthunāti

anu + thu + nā moans; laments; bewails.

anutrāsī

3 one who does not fear.

anudahati

anu + dah + a burns over; consumes.

anudahi

aor. of anudahati burnt over; consumed.

anuddiṭṭha

adjective not pointed out; not uttered.

anuddhaṭa

adjective not pulled out; not destroyed.

anupatati

anu + pat + a falls upon; befalls.

anupatita

pp. of anupatati affected with; oppressed by.

anupabbajati

anu + pa + vaj + a gives up worldly life in imitation of another.

anuparigacchati

anu + pari + gam + a goes round about.

anuparidhāvati

anu + pari + dhāv + a runs up and down or around.

anuparidhāvi

aor. ran up and down or around.

anupariyāti

anu + pari + yā + a goes round about.

anuparivattati

anu + pari + vat + a move round and round; keep on rolling.

anuparivatti

aor. moved round and round; kept on rolling.

anupalitta

adjective free from taint; not smeared with.

anupavatteti

anu + pa + vat + e continues rolling; wield power in succession.

anupavattesi

aor. continued rolling; wielded power in succession.

anupaviṭṭha

pp. continued rolling; wielded power in succession.

anupavisati

anu + pa + vis + a goes into; enters.

anupasampanna

adjective one who has not yet received the full ordination or upasampadā.

anupahacca

na + upa + han + ya without wounding or troubling.

anupātī

3 one who attacks or follows.

anupāpuṇāti

anu + pa + ap + unā reaches; attains.

anupāpeti
